column4: nm-applet does not show wireless signals (although I am connected wirelessly) can anyone help
if youre using the system > network, then it wont
I am using it, but I would like to stop using it and use nm-applet -- do you know how I can do this?
set the system > networking to "roaming" then dont touch it anymore and nm-applet should be able to do it.  a kill X may be required in between
